name: Neriek's GPC Repository
body:
### This is the Home for My GTuner Scripts(.gpc)

Basically what you'll find here are scripts as I work on them before releasing them on the gpclibrary(http://controllermax.com/gpclib).

You are free to use & edit them however you want for whatever you want, just keep in mind that some of the scripts will likely be unfinished(some may even be abandoned).

Finished Scripts will remain here, and have their own page for how to use them, such as combo & feature activating.


Everything here is free to use, and to implement into your own scripts, there are no licences, so don't worry about copyright. You are not obligated, but if you're nice feel free to credit me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
